body.name: Similac Total Comfort Infant Formula, Imported, Easy-to-Digest Baby Formula Powder, Non-GMO, 820 g (28.9 oz) Can
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 14 hrs 18 mins
features: COMPARABLE TO U.S. SIMILAC PRO-TOTAL COMFORT: This formula was manufactured in Spain and is similar to the U.S. version of Similac Pro-Total Comfort
FORMULA PREPARATION: Mix 1 scoop of formula per 2 fl oz (60 mL) of water
GENTLE FORMULA + IMMUNE SUPPORT: An easy-to-digest infant formula for babies with delicate tummies with 2'-FL and nucleotides to help support your baby’s immune system
MEETS THE U.S. FDA’s CRITERIA: This product meets the U.S. FDA’s criteria for temporarily allowing formulas manufactured outside the U.S. for import
body.description: Similac Total Comfort* is comparable to the U.S. version of Similac Pro-Total Comfort®. This gentle, asy-to-digest formula is a good choice for babies who have difficulty tolerating other milk-based formulas. Similac Total Comfort with 2'-FL and nucleotides helps support baby’s immune system. This product was manufactured in Spain. Abbott Nutrition has worked with the FDA to import this product to help with supply chain shortages. Because every baby’s tummy is unique, it can be difficult to predict how each baby will tolerate a formula change. It’s always best to talk to your pediatrician before making formula changes. * Not for infants or children with galactosemia.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why is the bottle preparation for the imported Similac Total Comfort “1 scoop to 60 mL water”? This formula has been imported from Spain. As such, the label measurements use the metric system. 60 mL is equivalent to 2 fl oz of water, which is similar to the typical preparation instructions for making a bottle. 1 scoop per 2 fl oz of water. If I have questions about formula imported by Abbott, should I call the number on the container or use the email on the container? For more information, contact our Similac Feeding Expert team at 800-986-8800, Monday through Friday 8:30 AM to 7 PM EST. Why do the directions call for boiling water for this product? It’s always best to prepare according to label instructions. Some countries recommend boiling water for 2 or 5 minutes. Ask your baby’s doctor if you need to use cooled, boiled water for mixing, and if you need to boil (sterilize) bottles, nipples, and rings before use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was sent to a homeless shelter to feed the babies that came with displaced mothers. I invite everyone to think about items that homeless people would need. Formula is expensive for anyone, especially those who are destitute.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my Baby's Sensitive Stomach and Colicky Babies!
reviews.reviewText: When our son was around 1 month old we discovered he is a colicky baby. After trying a number of different baby formula, this was the only one that didn't give him any gas or tummy issues. About 24 hours later, he was no longer fussy and has been happy and healthy ever since!Some of the reviews I have seen for this formula made us hesitant to purchase however I am glad we did. I understand after feeding, his breath does stink a little when we burb him but we don't feel that is too important. We believe how it affects his stomach and overall health is what truly matters.We have been feeding this to him for almost 3 months now and he is gaining weight at a good pace and still seems to really like this formula. Anytime we give him a bottle he sucks it down in no time!I would absolutely recommend this formula to any parents out there trying to help relieve their babies stomach pain, fussiness, and gassiness!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the only formula my son can use and it is only in one store so Amazon is a lifesaver! Especially subscribe and save!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is cheapest and easiest place to buy this formula. My child does great with it! We tried a few other kinds/brands in the first few months but kept coming back to this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Doctor changed due to flex and gas
reviews.reviewText: Baby seems to be handling this better then the other formula she was on.It says made in Europe so the measurement are different. Can is metal. Reminds me of what you buy coffee in. You get alot of formula.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: No la compren!...hace 2 dias mi bebe esta llorando por gases, con olor y ruidosos. Tiene 1 mes y dias de nacido.Antes le estuve dando por error la formula Similac para 1 año y no lloraba asi, y hace dos dias esta horrible! La compre porque asegura no dar colicos y es lo opuesto!...Hay una opinion de otro comprador que dice lo mismo, no voy a esperar que le de mas colicos. Y el solo toma 4 oz al dia de esta leche ya que le doy pecho. Si tomara solo esta leche, como estaria! Lo peor es que perdi 40$$

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great formula, baby loves it!
reviews.reviewText: I used to give my baby Similac Pro Total comfort, and the pediatrician gave me samples of this formula, baby loved it and immediately switched to this option. Great price and same quality and flavor. It's available in some retail stores but Amazon deal is better (at least $5 dollars less)
Item came with dent at the bottom
